text: Derajat is a region in central Pakistan, where the provinces of Punjab, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, and Balochistan meet. Derajat is bounded by the Indus River to the east, and the Sulaiman Mountains to the west. Main cities in derajat are Dera Ghazi Khan in southwestern Punjab, Dera Ismail Khan (southeastern Khyber Pakhtunkhwa), and Dera Bugti, Dera Allah Yar and Dera Murad Jamali in Balochistan. == References == Category:Regions of Pakistan
title: Derajat
